title: The Favorites - NFL Week 17 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 17 Gambling Preview
description:
It's the last week of the year to bet the NFL, and The Favorites is here to give 2021 a better sendoff than it deserves! Chad Millman and Simon Hunter of the Action Network break down a packed Week 17 slate and find more than a handful of games they feel great about... as long as healthy and safety protocols don't throw a wrench in their plans. They run through the entire schedule and select their Foxhole and Simon Says Bets of the Week. Will Miami's incredible run continue? Can anyone knock off Patrick Mahomes in the home stretch? Tune in and find out what the experts are saying!

TB @ NYJ 9 MIN

KC @ CIN 12 MIN

LV @ IND 15 MIN

PHI @ WFT 17 MIN

LAR @ BAL 21 MIN

ATL @ BUF 24 MIN

JAX @ NE 26 MIN

NYG @ CHI 28 MIN

MIA @ TEN 31 MIN

HOU @ SF 34 MIN

DEN @ LAC 36 MIN

CAR @ NO 37 MIN

ARI @ DAL 38 MIN

DET @ SEA 40 MIN

MIN @ GB 43 MIN

CLE @ PIT 46 MIN

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
